TopicTitle: Suggestion: Ability to unselect vessel to unlock full timewarp controls.

Articles.Content:
There is many times a situation where i am seeking for launching window.

When i try to timewarp it is very limited because of low orbit.

To avoid timewarp limit i currently have to jump to other vessel at high orbit and use that to timewarp until launching window occurs.

 

My suggestion is to ability to unselect currently flown ship by selecting planet it currently is orbitting, this would unlock full timewarp controls.
